levels.description: When skill is activated, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_AOE:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all enemies within range; afterwards, attack target count <@ba.vup>+1</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, splash area <@ba.vup>expands slightly</>
